H0.text: what is the name of the muslim dress. Abaya

H1.text: what is the name of the muslim dress. Jilbab

H2.text: what is the name of the muslim dress. Niqab

H3.text: what is the name of the muslim dress. hijab

A4.text: The abaya (colloquially and more commonly, Arabic: عباية ʿabāyah, especially in Literary Arabic: عباءة ʿabā'ah; plural عبايات ʿabāyāt, عباءات ʿabā'āt), sometimes also called an aba, is a simple, loose over-garment, essentially a robe-like dress, worn by some women in the Muslim world including most of the Middle East, North Africa, and parts of the Horn of Africa.

A5.text: The abaya in Indonesia takes on a unique style called the 'jilbab.'

A6.text: The BBC article 'Reinventing the Saudi abaya' discusses the abaya.
